sentence.Network_en: A large Texan redneck was shouting obscenities at Ali.

sentence.Network_en: A redneck is someone from the countryside who lives a country lifestyle.
sentence.Network_cn: 所以你叫一个人redneck就是说他是乡下人或很土气.

sentence.Network_en: Hank got beat up in a little redneck bar.
sentence.Network_cn: 汉克在乡下佬(注:美国南部的没有教养的白人体力劳动者)的小酒吧里被打了一顿.

entry.tran: 红脖子，乡巴佬（尤指美国社会底层的乡下人，受教育程度较低，想法固执片面）
entry.def: If someone describes a white man, especially a lower class American from the countryside, as a redneck, they disapprove of him because they think he is uneducated and has strong, unreasonable opinions.

example.ex: A large Texan redneck was shouting obscenities at Ali.
example.tran: 一个大块头的得克萨斯州红脖子正对阿里骂着脏话。

means.word_mean: 1. a poor white person in the southern United States
